We looked at this year and in particular our prospects for growth in Europe, and our businesses globally are doing well, both our core business as well as our adjacent businesses, our ''hockey stick' businesses as we call them. It's all very, very good. We are going to invest in Europe, Last week Eric Schmidt said he will step down as the company''s CEO to become executive chairman,

chief executive, Google said Thursday.Current CEO Eric Schmidt will assume the role of executive chairman and will focus on deals and external relations. Sergey Brin , the other Google co-founder, will focus on new products the company said. We have been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, said Eric Schmidt in announcing the decision.
